main event: An unidentified object was observed in New Plymouth, New Zealand on 18 May 1963 at 10:30 PM.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4 minutes,The object was stationary and displayed sudden speeds,It had flashing and changing brightness,The object changed colors between white and blue,The object was extremely bright, fuzzy, and blurred, and was observed moving from west to south.
witness description: No specific information on the witness was provided, but the source is civilian.
